titleInfo.title: OGDEN FIRE COMPANY NO. 1 et al v. UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER THAT PLAINTIFFS' MOTION FOR SUMMARY JUDGMENT AND DEFENDANTS' MOTION FOR SUMMARY JUDGMENT ARE GRANTED IN PART AND DENIED IN PART. PLAINTIFFS' MOTION FOR SUMMARY JUDGMENT IS GRANTED WITH RESPECT TO COUNT I AND WITH RESPECT TO THEIR CLAIM IN COUNT II, THAT THE ZONING HEARING BOARD OF UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP'S DENIAL OF THEIR REQUESTS FOR SPECIAL EXCEPTIONS VIOLATES 47 USC SECT. 332(c)(7)(B). SAID MOTION IS DENIED IN ALL OTHER RESPECTS. DEFENDANTS' MOTION FOR SUMMARY JUDGMENT IS GRANTED WITH RESPECT TO PLAINTIFFS' CLAIM, IN COUNT II, THAT THE ZONING HEARING BOARD OF UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP'S DENIAL OF THEIR REQUESTS FOR VARIANCES VIOLATES 47 USC 332(c)(7)(B). SAID MOTION IS DENIED IN ALL OTHER RESPECTS. UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP AND THE ZONING HEARING BOARD OF UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP'S ARE HEREBY ORDERED TO GRANT THE APPLICATION OF OGDEN FIRE COMPANY NO. 1 AND SPRINT SPECTRUM, LP TO BUILD A 130 FOOT MONOPOLE RADIO TOWER AND RELATED RADIO EQUIPMENT AS AN ACCESSORY USE TO OGDEN'S USE OF ITS PROPERTY AS A FIRE HOUSE AND TO ISSUE PLAINTIFFS THE REQUESTED SPECIAL EXCEPTIONS IN ACCORDANCE WITH ZONING ORDINANCE SECT. 1706 AND 303.7. UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP SHALL ISSUE ANY AND ALL ZONING PERMITS FOR THE PROPOSED TOWER AND SUPPORTING STRUCTURES WITHIN 30 DAYS OF THE DATE OF THIS ORDER. SIGNED BY JUDGE JOHN R. PADOVA ON 3/30/06. 3/31/06 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(le, )

extension.docketText: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER THAT PLAINTIFFS' MOTION FOR SUMMARY JUDGMENT AND DEFENDANTS' MOTION FOR SUMMARY JUDGMENT ARE GRANTED IN PART AND DENIED IN PART. SAID MOTION IS DENIED IN ALL OTHER RESPECTS. DEFENDANTS' MOTION FOR SUMMARY JUDGMENT IS GRANTED WITH RESPECT TO PLAINTIFFS' CLAIM, IN COUNT II, THAT THE ZONING HEARING BOARD OF UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP'S DENIAL OF THEIR REQUESTS FOR VARIANCES VIOLATES 47 USC 332(c)(7)(B). SAID MOTION IS DENIED IN ALL OTHER RESPECTS. UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP AND THE ZONING HEARING BOARD OF UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP'S ARE HEREBY ORDERED TO GRANT THE APPLICATION OF OGDEN FIRE COMPANY NO. 1 AND SPRINT SPECTRUM, LP TO BUILD A 130 FOOT MONOPOLE RADIO TOWER AND RELATED RADIO EQUIPMENT AS AN ACCESSORY USE TO OGDEN'S USE OF ITS PROPERTY AS A FIRE HOUSE AND TO ISSUE PLAINTIFFS THE REQUESTED SPECIAL EXCEPTIONS IN ACCORDANCE WITH ZONING ORDINANCE SECT. 1706 AND 303.7. UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP SHALL ISSUE ANY AND ALL ZONING PERMITS FOR THE PROPOSED TOWER AND SUPPORTING STRUCTURES WITHIN 30 DAYS OF THE DATE OF THIS ORDER. SIGNED BY JUDGE JOHN R. PADOVA ON 3/30/06. 3/31/06 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(le, )

titleInfo.title: OGDEN FIRE COMPANY NO. 1 et al v. UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER THAT DEFENDANTS SHALL SHOW CAUSE BY 1/31/2007, WHY AN INJUNCTION SHOULD NOT BE ENTERED REQUIRING UPPER CHICHESTER TOWNSHIP TO APPROVE A SUBDIVISION AND LAND DEVELOPMENT APPLICATION WITH RESPECT TO THE LEASING OF LAND BETWEEN SPRINT SPECTRUM, LP AND OGDEN FIRE COMPANY NO. 1 AND TO ISSUE A BUILDING PERMIT FOR THE BUILDING OF THE 130 FOOT MONOPOLE RADIO TOWER AND RELATED AUDIO EQUIPMENT. PLAINTIFFS MAY FILE A RESPONSE TO DEFENDANTS' SUBMISSIONS BY 2/12/2007. SIGNED BY JUDGE JOHN R. PADOVA ON 1/16/07. 1/17/07 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(le, )
